get_data¶

goes_ortho.get_data.get_dem(demtype, bounds, api_key, out_fn=None, proj='EPSG:4326')¶

download a DEM of choice from OpenTopography World DEM ## first written by David Shean Parameters ———— demtype: str

type of DEM to fetch (e.g., SRTMGL1, SRTMGL1_E, SRTMGL3 etc)

bounds: list

geographic aoi extent in format (minx,miny,maxx,maxy)

out_fn: str

path to output filename

t_srs: str

output DEM projection

Returns¶

out_DEM: str

path to output DEM (useful if the downloaded DEM is reprojected to custom proj)

goes_ortho.get_data.run_bash_command(cmd)¶

Call a system command through the subprocess python module.

goes_ortho.get_data.download_example_data() → None¶

Fetch the GOES ABI example files.
